hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/566487cfdd72d8b7848698bed97730c50ec10890)

 We have $8\text{ tens}$ and $7\text{ ones}$.

In all, there are $8\text{ tens}$ and $7\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0f0a188824de89bfad7a0c0b07934006ae350620)

$8\text{ tens} + 7\text{ ones}= 87$
